content:
The Fjallraven Kanken is a fantastic backpack, and it's great to hear that it served you well on your Chicago trip!

The Kanken is known for its durability, comfort, and versatility, making it an excellent choice for city breaks like your trip to Chicago. Its 16L capacity is spacious enough to fit all the essentials, yet compact enough to navigate crowded streets and public transportation.

The Fjallraven brand is also popular among travelers and outdoor enthusiasts due to its high-quality materials, functional design, and sustainable approach.

It's wonderful that you found the Kanken comfortable to carry around the city, even with all your belongings inside. The backpack's padded shoulder straps and back panel, along with its ergonomic design, are designed to distribute the weight evenly and provide excellent support.

If you're planning to use the same backpack for your NYC trip, you might consider packing a few items differently or adding some packing cubes to help you stay organized. Since you've already tested the backpack on a 5-day trip, you know its capabilities, and you can fine-tune your packing strategy accordingly.

Do you have any specific plans or activities in mind for your NYC trip, or are there any particular neighborhoods or attractions you're looking forward to exploring?
